block.comment: Remove the ticket from tracking table

input.subject: #{_('data.workato.job_context.recipe_name')} Error

block.comment: If a ticket is found for the customer

input.subject: #{_('data.workato.job_context.recipe_name')} Error
input.body:
Job URL: #{_('data.workato.job_context.job_url')}
More than 1 ticket found in lookup table ESS_REMOVAL_TICKET_TRACKING : https://app.workato.com/lookup_tables/

block.comment: If there is more than one ticket for the customer, something has gone wrong and needs to be looked at
